name: ShrimPassion
description:
ShrimPassion

Help Shu Rimp da Silva, the main shrimp character, to get over the obstacles of life and beat the seafood enemies that tryed to deprive him of love back in the see from where he was captured.

This 2D plataform game was made by five students of computation as our final test to a games subject. 

The game is mainly for fun and entretainment, with some challenging aspects to test some skills, but you absolutely dont need to be a try hard to play it.

Run, jump, scape, defeat enemies and, most important, enjoy!

Check our Github Repo!

Controlls:

Arrow left = move left

Arrow right = move right

Space = jump

Z = Dash

X = Shot

C = Melee
